Directed by MichaÃ«l R. Roskam. Joe Chappelle. Jim McKay.

Written by Riccardo DiLoreto. Riccardo DiLoreto. James Keene. Dennis Lehane. Dennis Lehane. Dennis Lehane. Hillel Levin. Sean K. Smith. Sean K. Smith. Steve Harris.

Cast Paul Walter Hauser( Larry Hall ) . Sepideh Moafi( Lauren McCauley ) . Greg Kinnear( Brian Miller ) . Ray Liotta( Big Jim Keene ) . Joe Williamson( CO Carter ) . Robert Wisdom( Edmund Beaumont ) . Robyn Malcolm( Sammy ) . Tony Amendola( Vincent Gigante ) . Melanie Nicholls-King( Dr. Amelia Hackett ) . Jake McLaughlin( Gary Hall ) . Laney Stiebing( Jessica Roach ) . Cecilia Leal( Rochelle ) . Trazi Lashawn( CO Holt ) . John Jabaley( CO Burden ) . Carlo Alban( Chris Drysdale ) . Christopher B. Duncan( Dr. Aaron Zicherman ) . Cullen Moss( Detective Russ Aborn ) . Christopher Berry( Judge ) . Charles Green( Robert Hall ) . Jeff Robins( Donny ) . Kiley Casciano( Lynne Keene ) . Brandon Morales( CO Charlie ) . Kwajalyn Brown( Judge Diane Wood ) . Michael Francis Horn( DeArmond ) . Rudy Eisenzopf( Jeff Steinbeck ) . Jason Bayle( Detective Johansen ) . Christopher Backus( Young Big Jim Keene ) . Cade Tropeano( Young Larry Hall ) . Blue Clarke( Young Jimmy Keene ) . Lee Tergesen( Roger Nevins ) . James DuMont( Sheriff Charnitski ) . Bernard Hocke( Priest ) . Karsen Liotta( Audrey Hansen ) . Michael Aaron Milligan( Mackowski ) . Peter Jaymes Jr.( Vomiting Inmate ) . Zach Rogers( Self Harm Inmate ) . Sylvia Jouet( Young Jessica Roach ) . Knox Manasco( Young Gary Hall ) . T.C. Matherne( Lenny ) . Rachel Looney( Tricia Reitler ) . Joey Bicicchi( Percy ) . Valerie Purvis( Young Jessica Roach’s Sister ) . Casey Groves( Young Mr. Roach ) . Lawrence Turner( Stoned Prisoner ) . Santo Panzarella( Brendan ) . Logan Macrae( Schultz ) . Brett Gentile( Agent Mark Ellenberg ) . Rachel Whitman Groves( Young Mrs. Roach ) . Stephen Louis Grush( Danny Dunn ) . Eric Esteban( Wabash Police Chief ) . Cooper Jack Rubin( Little Boy ) . Taylor Davidson( Waitress ) . Carter Bellaimey( Leper Prisoner ) . Walker Babington( Falco ) . Braxton Alexander( Teenage Jimmy ) . Brandon Sutton( Hogan ) . Ryan Broussard( Strack ) . James Keene( CO #8 ) . Meghan Wolfe( Jessica Roach’s Sister ) . Kevin Pozzo( DEA Goon ) . Michael Tacconi( DEA Williamson ) . Ellison Booker( Young Clerk ) . Bill Martin Williams( John Dickey ) . Jeff Grays( Emotional Inmate ) . Emily Misner( Berniece (Larry’s Mother) ) . Robert Walker Branchaud( Malcolm Winslow ) . Holly Bonney( Flight Attendant ) . Domin/epique McClellan( CO Guest ) . Fred Davis( FCI Guard ) . Avery Echelard( Brooke Miller (Age 12) ) . Austin Naulty( Surly Con ) . Jenny Ballard( Andrea Miller ) . Addison Ross( Brooke Miller (Age 7) ) . Robert Diago DoQui( Sheriff Pat Hartshorn ) . Sam Malone( Drayton Jeffries ) . Jason Edwards( Detective Boyd ) . Joseph Bishop( Red Tier Prisoner B3-08 (uncredited) ) . Dontez Williams( Prisoner (uncredited) ) . Joshua Moody( Court Runner (uncredited) ) . Erica Rowell Green( State Trooper (uncredited) ) . Elton LeBlanc( Judge (uncredited) ) . Scott Green( Prison Guard (uncredited) ) . Anthony Michael Frederick( Guard #1 (uncredited) ) . Shawn Sanz( FBI Agent (uncredited) ) . Rose Bianca Grue( Pedestrian (uncredited) ) . Suzette Lange( Wabash Community Member (uncredited) ) . Craig Deroche( Courtroom Bailiff (uncredited) ) . Madeline Read( Begging Teenager (uncredited) ) . Fabian Blache III( ATF Agent (uncredited) ) . Chad Governale( DEA (uncredited) ) . Michael Biss( Best Friend (uncredited) ) . Jami Bolin( Driver (uncredited) ) . Raheem Allen( Agricultural Worker (uncredited) ) . Carter Patrick MacFarland( Catalina Driver (uncredited) )

Language English.

Producers Kary Antholis. Joe Chappelle. David Diliberto. Taron Egerton. Dan Friedkin. Ryan Friedkin. Joe Guest. James Keene. Scott Lambert. Dennis Lehane. Jim McKay. Alexandra Milchan. Richard Plepler. MichaÃ«l R. Roskam. Bradley Thomas. Martin Salgo. Dan Friedkin.

Production Apple Studios. Apple. Crime Story Media.

 

Number of Seasons 1

Number of Episodes 6

Status Finished (2022–2022)
